content: How do I know which team member to ping when I have an issue? (I have one in a PR) I need someone for a question but how do I know which team member will be the most knowledgeable to ping in my case? I doubt it's good practice to just ping a random member.
I usually use git log or git blame to find out who has recently changed the file significantly
another option is to ask here on an appropriate channel instead of asking a particular person
